thread.title: HIGH SCHOOL GOLF: Whitman-Hanson players are aces in the community | High School Insider | with Danny Ventura & Jim Clark
thread.title_full: HIGH SCHOOL GOLF: Whitman-Hanson players are aces in the community | High School Insider | with Danny Ventura & Jim Clark | Boston Herald

author: Dan Ventura
title: HIGH SCHOOL GOLF: Whitman-Hanson players are aces in the community | High School Insider | with Danny Ventura & Jim Clark
text:
There are many random acts of kindness throughout the high school sports scene.
 The latest comes from Whitman-Hanson, where members of the golf team spent Saturday morning at the Whitman Food Pantry. The team helped empty each shelf, check expiration dates on food goods, clean and disinfect all the shelving, boxes, and items, and reorganize/stock canned and various donated goods.
 "It was great to see the team give back to the community today," coach Brian Dempsey said in a release. "I'm not sure that high school students are often in the position to go out of their way to give back like the team did today. I think it is such a great life experience and lesson for all of them. Golf is very much an individual sport, so it was great to see them all come together, truly work as a team, and quite honestly, have fun!"
